name: Escape From Space For Mental Health Jam
name_original: Escape From Space For Mental Health Jam
description:
Goal Is To Match Pictures Then Shoot Other Spaceships By Leaving hearts When They Are Destroyed Rather Than Normal Ways Which Must Be Explosions. Also With That, My Game Aimed To Turn Habitual Bad Thoughts Into Good Thoughts 

Controls

A,D  Or  Right-Left Arrow Keys = To Fly

Button At Bottom (By Clicking Cursor) = To Shoot
